text: Neuzhto ne prishla k nim vest' o tekh, Kotoryye do nikh (greshili), - O lyudyakh Nukha, Ad, Samud, O lyudyakh Ibrakhima i obitatelyakh Madyana, O lyudyakh nisproverzhennykh seleniy? K nim s yasnymi znamen'yami (ot Nas) Poslanniki ikh prikhodili. I ne Allakh na nikh obrushil zlo - Zlo svoim dusham prichinili oni sami
